verses.verse: Furthermore <S%G3063><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> we <S%G2065>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> you <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that <S%G2531>as<s%> ye have <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> so ye <S%G2443>would<s%> <S%G4052>abound<s%> more and <S%G3123>more.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> even <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G38>sanctification,<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> should <S%G567>abstain<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> fornication: <S%G4202><s%>

That every <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> should <S%G1492>know<s%> how to <S%G2932>possess<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor;<s%>

That <S%G3361>no<s%> man go <S%G5233>beyond<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4122>defraud<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> any <S%G4229>matter:<s%> because <S%G1360>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is the <S%G1558>avenger<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5130>such,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> we <S%G2532>also<s%> have <S%G4277>forewarned<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1263>testified.<s%>

He therefore that <S%G114>despiseth,<s%> <S%G5105><s%> <S%G114>despiseth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who hath also <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G4012>touching<s%> brotherly <S%G5360>love<s%> ye <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G5532><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> that I <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> taught of <S%G2312>God<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another.<s%>

And <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532>indeed<s%> ye <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> we <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that ye <S%G4052>increase<s%> more and <S%G3123>more;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> that ye <S%G5389>study<s%> to be <S%G2270>quiet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to do your own <S%G4238>business,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2038>work<s%> with <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> we <S%G3853>commanded<s%> <S%G5213>you;<s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> ye may <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2156>honestly<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> them that are <S%G1854>without,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that ye may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>lack<s%> of <S%G3367>nothing.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> have <S%G5209>you<s%> to be <S%G50>ignorant,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> them which are <S%G2837>asleep,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye <S%G3076>sorrow<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3062>others<s%> which <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1680>hope.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> rose <S%G450>again,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> them also which <S%G2837>sleep<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> will <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> which are <S%G2198>alive<s%> and <S%G4035>remain<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G5348>prevent<s%> them which are <S%G2837>asleep.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> shall <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G2752>shout,<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G743>archangel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G4536>trump<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall <S%G450>rise<s%> first: <S%G4412><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> which are <S%G2198>alive<s%> and <S%G4035>remain<s%> shall be caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G260>together<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3507>clouds<s%> to <S%G1519>meet<s%> <S%G529><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G109>air:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall we <S%G3842>ever<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
